text_block_list.name: Espectadores
text_block_list.text:
Wooooo! Long live the Emperor! Long<n>live the
Emperor!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Entrenador... Estos vítores. ¿Son...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ya veo... Así que gané.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
So in the zone you didn't even realize it?<n>That's
unlike you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But you know, you look pretty rad when<n>you're
following your heart! ♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Maruzensky...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Tienes mis gracias.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I could not have achieved such focus<n>against
anybody else. I enjoyed myself<n>so much because
it was you I was racing<n>against.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Geez, you can't drop a line like that<n>when you
just made me eat your dust.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ja. Bueno, permíteme reformular.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Maruzensky. You were<n>quarry fit for
an Emperor.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: ¿Aún con lo de la caza? ¡Qué malo!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Jajaja... Perdóname. No pude resistir.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Fine, I'll let you off the hook. But only<n>'cause of
that cute smile.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Hasta la vista, Emperor. But you'd better<n>watch
your back, or next time I really<n>will gobble you
up! ♪

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Ja... La próxima vez, dice.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Even if there is a next time, I doubt I'll<n>be able to
run like I did today.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's strange. I feel like I became one with<n>the race
itself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
This race should have required all of my<n>
concentration and resourcefulness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But all I could think about was the joy of<n>it. The
wind on my face, the movements<n>of the racers,
the pounding of my feet<n>on the track...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It was... fun. A lot of fun. Perhaps the<n>most fun
I've ever had while racing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And it's all because you encouraged me<n>to
compete as I truly am.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Gracias, Entrenador.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
You helped me recall the primal desire<n>that draws
all Umamusume to the track.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see now that racing is enjoyable for its<n>own
sake... And at the end of a race well<n>run, there
lies bliss.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I want all Umamusume to feel the joy I<n>feel right
now. And so I shall hold my<n>ideals high.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Now more than ever, I must strive toward<n>those
ideals with all my might. And that<n>is why I require
your help.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
After all, it's not only Umamusume who<n>can show
the world the joy of racing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Will you stay by my side, Trainer? Will<n>you
continue to indulge this wild dream<n>of mine?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I gaze into Symboli Rudolf's eyes and<n>see the
resolve therein, I realize that<n>here, now, I'm
witnessing the birth of the<n>true Emperor.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Click! Flash! Click!

text_block_list.name: Reporteros
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf! How do you feel about<n>your
victory?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Parece que la prensa está llamando. Perfecto<n>momento.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Would you mind gathering the<n>reporters? I would
like to start the press<n>conference right away.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Greetings, ladies and gentlemen. I hope<n>you will
forgive my formalities.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I come before you today to tell you<n>about the
Emperor's dream.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My dream is to create a world where all<n>
Umamusume can live in bliss.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Many look down on this ideal. "How can<n>you
make everybody happy?" they spit.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: "What can one person do alone?" they<n>sneer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
"Who will follow a half-grown monarch?"<n>they
scoff.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
For years now, I have striven to<n>personally prove
those doubts false.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Solo ahora entiendo que estaba<n>equivocada.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I cannot make everybody happy... I musttrust in everyone's capacity to winhappiness for themselves.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Nor can I accomplish anything alone... I<n>must trust
in the comrades who stand by<n>my side.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And sure enough, nobody will follow a<n>half-grown
monarch. That is why I must<n>first have absolute
faith in my own path.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Let me speak now to you—you beyond<n>the
screen, listening to or reading these<n>words—you
whom perhaps I will one day<n>meet face-to-face.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
My name is Symboli Rudolf, the<n>Emperor, and
today I have taken my<n>place as the greatest of all
Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
By the crowns I have won, I swear to be<n>true to
your dreams.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And to those who seek glory, I bid you,<n>come
before my throne.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Recibiré su desafío con los brazos<n>abiertos.
